title: How Fintech And Edutech Companies Calling The Shots In Cricket Sponsorship?
snippet: The much hyped Bitcoin exchange platforms are the latest to join the cricket sponsorship bandwagon already in the grip of edutech and real money gaming players.

title: Highest oxygen consumption of COVID patients recorded yesterday (Video)
snippet: The highest oxygen consumption in hospitals was reported yesterday (20) as the number of COVID patients who depend on oxygen continues to increase. The Ministry of Health stated that the reserves of the two private companies that supply oxygen to hospitals are gradually declining.

title: With black flags, Sri Lanka Christians protest bombing probe
snippet: Sri Lanka's Christian community hoisted black flags at churches and homes on Saturday to express anger over the government's investigation into the 2019 Easter Sunday bomb attacks, which killed 269 people.

title: Duties, functions of Namal's new ministry gazetted
snippet: A new Gazette Extraordinary has specified the duties, functions and institutional & legal framework of the Ministry of Development Co-ordination and Monitoring

title: Among France's poorest, once-lagging vaccine rates jump
snippet: The poorest region in mainland France has managed to dramatically speed up its Covid-19 vaccination campaign in recent weeks, notably by opening walk-in pop-up centers to reach out to people where they live and work.

title: Covid death toll exceeds 7,000 mark
snippet: The total number of Covid-19 deaths in Sri Lanka exceeded 7,000 with 198 more deaths being reported today. A total of 198 more COVID-19 related deaths that occurred yesterday (20) were confirmed by the Director-General of Health Services today pushing the death toll to 7,

title: Indian batsman Suryakumar Yadav Dancing With Wife After Reuniting With Her in London After 65 Days, Heartwarming Video Goes Viral
snippet: India cricketer Suryakumar Yadav finally reunited with his wife in London after a period of two months and the couple celebrated it by doing a small jig on Friday. He has been away from his wife since he entered the bio bubble of the Indian squad which toured Sri Lanka last month.

title: Sri Lanka recognizes Taliban authority in Kabul, accepts 'amnesty'
snippet: Sri Lanka has recognized the authority of the Islamic fundamentalist Taliban which fought their way to power in Afghanistan and expressed happiness at an "amnesty"' offered by them to foreigners.

title: U.S. Weekly Infections Surge; Lockdowns Expanded: Virus Update
snippet: U.S. weekly infections slightly exceeded 1 million on Friday, apparently for the first time since the surge last winter, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University and Bloomberg.

title: Sri Lanka bans 'drunk driving' of elephants in new protection law
snippet: COLOMBO: Sri Lanka will issue captive elephants with their own biometric identity cards and ban their riders from drinking on the job under a wide-ranging new animal protection law, reports AFP. Many

title: Kerala cannabis worth over Rs. 1 million seized
snippet: About 3kg and 548g of Kerala cannabis were seized by the Sri Lanka Navy during a special operation conducted in Jayanagar of Kuchchaveli, Trincomalee this afternoon.

title: Delta variant continues to disrupt life
snippet: Australian police arrested hundreds of anti-lockdown protesters in Melbourne and Sydney yesterday and seven officers were hospitalised as a result of clashes, as the country saw its highest ever single-day rise in Covid-19 cases.

title: SLNS Shakthi: Sailing to Save Lives
snippet: One of these landing ship tankers, SLNS Shakthi (L880), responded to the nation's clarion call and her crew set sail to Chennai, India from the Eastern Naval Command Harbour in Trincomalee. This was done on a directive of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa who instructed Navy Commander Vice Admiral Nishantha Ulugetenne to urgently deploy a naval ship for this task.

title: A 'constant rollercoaster': England's holiday rules changed 50 times during Covid outbreak
snippet: The Greek island of Crete is added ... November 21 2020: Israel, Namibia, Rwanda, Sri Lanka, Uruguay, Bonaire, St Eustatius and Saba, the Northern Mariana Islands and the US Virgin Islands are added to the travel corridors list. - 24.

title: IPL: Royal Challengers Bangalore find missing pieces to fill gaps
snippet: Hasaranga has been roped in by the Virat Kohli-led team as a replacement for Australian leg-spinner Adam Zampa

title: The Latest: Orlando urges water limits amid COVID-19 surge
snippet: The mayor of Orlando is asking residents to stop watering their lawns and washing their cars for a least a week, saying water usage needed to be cut back because of the recent surge of COVID-19 hospitalizations.

title: Open letter to R.Sampanthan
snippet: Looking at the recent past I find you are obsessed with false unexp[lained Tamil people's aspirations and issues that are not explained.  I find it difficult to understand what your Tamil peop[le are deprived of. One day you go to a Teplis woman, the next day you go to the Indian High Commissioner and now you want to see President Rajapakse to discuss the grievances of Tamil people.  At this hour of Covid 19 Pandemic every freeloader must join hands with GOSL to fight Covid.  One must be frothing mad to clammer for personal gains with a hidden agenda.  If there is genuine desire to serve your Tamil people, you join hands with the government to develop the North. I do not believe you have the right to speak on non-existing issues in the east.  Simply crisscrossing the country one day with Teplis woman and the next day with the Indian High Commissioner  and another day with the President makes you dumb dumb look an absolute clown.  If not a joker or a comedian.  Oi Sampanthan, you swam the Palk Strait in the 1940s and entered the country as an illegal immigrant a KALLATHONI and haven't you done well at the expense of Sri Lankan people?  Look back into the ;past and see if you have achieved anything for the Sri Lankan people? None.  There are no issues in existence.  All Sri Lankan people have some form of a grievance not only to Tamil people 12% of the total population for preferential treatment that is not even enjoyed by the total population  of 75%. It is unrealistic and unreasonable for you to agitage in your false campaign to topple the government.  Do you think Sri Lanka is owned by the Teplis woman or Indian High Commissioner?  Listen carefully Sampanthan, if there are any issues to be resolved, they are common to all Sri Lankan people and not only to Sri Lankan Tamil People.  I suggest if you are not happy with the Sri Lankan government you are free to go back to where you came from.  There is no one stopping you from doing that and please make sure you take back with you all your Tamils leaving behind the peace loving moderate Tamil people living amongst the majority Sinhalese.  Sampanthan, You are nothing but a S…. stirrer.  At your old age my advice to you is Please retire from politics with grace.  Enough is enough you have been a freeloader and a Sh.. Stirrer for so long.  Please get the hell out of my country. should be sent back to where they belong, where their hearts, minds and loyalties are to save the Sinhalese race and Sri Lanka from these traitors along with the fastest breeding religion aka religion of violence mussies! Dutch bar stewards brought the worst imaginable to work in tobacco plantations in the N&E. Then british brought more of the same to work in tea plantations. Then 1000s of more traitor kallathonis landed in our shores in the 60s to save their lives from the severe famine in tn. Today, all the traitors are natives with 1000s of years of bogus history in www. and books. The oldest building in N&E is the dutch rascals' fort in jaffna. There is no tamils Anuradhapuras or Polonnaruwas in the country means no 1000s of years history. Knowing Sinhalese are divided thanks to anti Buddhist, anti Sinhalese, anti Sri Lanka, minority worshiping, Mother Lanka dismembering UNPatriotic_rats murderous (Sinhalese Buddhists only). The traitor foreigners can live anywhere in the country, write in tamil marked up tamils (are very generous of course to fill medical, engineering etc faculties in the country), graduate costing the traitors 000000 cents and give money to murder the Sinhalese and dismember Mother Lanka! Where in the world you find these sort of cancers? Traitor alugosuwa (to Sinhalese Buddhists only) thambi mudiyanselage jr@ scrapped Sirima-Shasthri Pact and gave citizenship to 650,000+ estate tamils who were prepared to go to tn voluntarily. Today, they must be numbering 3-4 millions or even more and waiting eagerly for a corridor to develop to connect to a greater drealam. We did not bring any of these cancers to our shores. Start an online petition to send these undesirables who are getting ready kill us all and throw us into the ocean. Start the petition NOW to save the Sinhalese race and Mother Lanka!

title: Gloom in the air, it's time to raise the nation's spirits
snippet: No longer all the failures could be blamed on seven decades of dynastic rule and misgovernance. The strategic environment—beyond India's control—has deteriorated rapidly.
